SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# = &UC4_JBOSS_CLI#
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-queue' :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# = 'jms-topic' : ELSE : PRINT Unknown resource type: &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = 'Managed Domain' : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE# = '' : PRINT Profile must not be empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE# --profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD# = '/subsystem=messaging/hornetq-server=default' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# = '&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#' :ENDIF
failIfMissing() { : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' echo Queue name &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# did not exist : ELSE echo Topic name &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# did not exist : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_MISSING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF }
echo Checking queue/topic existence..
! check if the queue/topic exists already result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource")
result=$(printf "%s\n" "$result" | grep '"outcome" => "success"')
if [ -z "$result" ]; then failIfMissing fi
result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload")
echo Deleting queue/topic..
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Queue' &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# remove --queue-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX ! delete address-setting if it existed result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/address-setting=jms.queue.&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:remove") :ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_TYPE# = 'Topic' &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_COMMAND# remove --topic-address=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/address-setting=jms.topic.&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:remove") : ENDIF :ENDIF
result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload")
! re-check sleep 5 result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_QUERY_CMD#/&UC4RB_JBOSS_JMS_TYPE#=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource")
result=$(printf "%s\n" "$result" | grep '"outcome" => "success"')
if [ -z "$result" ]; then echo Successfully deleted queue/topic else echo Failed to delete queue/topic exit 1 fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
